item.title: One thing I learnt from : Comic Villains
item.description: Works of literature are distilled form of human perception patterns. In a way, they are more real than non-fiction.

item.title: The Biggest Story
item.description: Entropy and Life Entropy is the measure of disorderliness, in oddly simple terms.

item.title: Eudaimonia
item.description: Humans appeared on earth around 200,000 years ago but most human advancements are from the last 500 years.
